Desc.entry: A group of residents helping to preserve and improve the character of Crosspool. Aims to consult with and improve the quality of life of residents. The forum has subgroups to cover different issues such as highways, events and planning.

ContactName.entry: Mr Ian Hague, Secretary, Chairman and Editor
